name: channel_history_changed
desc: Bulk updates were made to a channel's history.
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community Bulk updates were made to a channel's history  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					channels:history 				 A channel_history_changed event is sent to all clients in a channel when bulk changes have occurred to that channel's history. When clients receive this message they should reload chat history for the channel if they have any cached messages before latest. This message is most often triggered as the result of a channel data import by a team administrator.
